sql.query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM dev.default.flights WHERE FlightDelay = true
SELECT FlightDelay, COUNT(*) as count FROM dev.default.flights GROUP BY FlightDelay
SELECT FLOOR(FlightDelayMin / 30) * 30 AS bucket, COUNT(*) AS doc_count FROM dev.default.flights GROUP BY bucket ORDER BY bucket
SELECT carrier, COUNT(*) as count FROM dev.default.flights GROUP BY Carrier ORDER BY count DESC

SELECT date_format(window.start, 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'),MAX(AvgTicketPrice) AS avg_ticket_price FROM dev.default.flights GROUP BY window(to_utc_timestamp(timestamp, 'UTC'),'1 day') ORDER BY window.start

SELECT OriginCountry, DestCountry, cnt
          FROM (
          SELECT
          OriginCountry,
          DestCountry,
          cnt,
          ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY OriginCountry ORDER BY cnt DESC) AS dest_rn
          FROM (
          SELECT
          OriginCountry,
          DestCountry,
          COUNT(*) AS cnt
          FROM your_table
          WHERE OriginCountry IN (
          SELECT OriginCountry
          FROM (
          SELECT OriginCountry, COUNT(*) AS cnt
          FROM your_table
          GROUP BY OriginCountry
          ORDER BY cnt DESC
          LIMIT 5
          ) AS top_origins
          )
          GROUP BY OriginCountry, DestCountry
          ) AS grouped
          ) AS ranked
          WHERE dest_rn <= 5
          ORDER BY cnt DESC;
